name: Abundant Phlogiston
title: Abundant Phlogiston
desc: A special high-temperature thermal energy that can be found throughout Natlan. It comes in all shapes and sizes, and has many wondrous uses...\nAfter Nightsoul points are fully depleted, warriors will switch to consuming Phlogiston to maintain their Nightsoul's Blessing.

skills.desc: After the next time your character uses Nightsoul points this Round: This character will regain 1 Nightsoul point.
